# eNOW Login Feature Test Plan

## Requirements Analysis

| Scenario Name | Requirement | Test Case |
|---------------|-------------|-----------|
| Scenario 1: Login to eNOW | 1.1 The Login screen should display when users click on the eNOW link | 1.1.1 Verify the Login screen appears when clicking the eNOW link |
|  | 1.2 The Login screen should have correct elements | 1.2.1 Verify right half of screen presents a configurable image |
|  |  | 1.2.2 Verify top left provides a language dropdown with all available languages |
|  |  | 1.2.3 Verify screen label shows "Login" |
|  |  | 1.2.4 Verify the text entry box is labeled "Email" |
|  |  | 1.2.5 Verify text entry box has default content "Enter email" |
|  |  | 1.2.6 Verify "Next" button is present with configurable color and enabled by default |
|
| Scenario 2: Click on "Language" Dropdown | 2.1 Language dropdown should display list of available languages | 2.1.1 Verify clicking on language dropdown presents list of available languages |
|  | 2.2 Available languages should include English and Spanish | 2.2.1 Verify English and Spanish are available in the language dropdown |
|
| Scenario 3: Click on a Language from the "Language" Dropdown | 3.1 Selecting a language should set it as the language for eNOW | 3.1.1 Verify selected language becomes the setting for use within eNOW |
|  | 3.2 Contents on Login page should be presented in selected language | 3.2.1 Verify contents on Login page are presented in the selected language |
|  | 3.3 Language dropdown should be dismissed after selection | 3.3.1 Verify language dropdown list is dismissed after selection |
|
| Scenario 4: User Clicks on the Next Button - No Value Entered in Text Box | 4.1 System should display error message when Next is clicked with empty text box | 4.1.1 Verify message "Enter an email" is displayed when Next is clicked with empty text box |
|
| Scenario 5: User Enters Text into Email Address Text Box | 5.1 System should display validation message while user is typing | 5.1.1 Verify message "Please enter a valid email address" is displayed when typing in the text box |
|  | 5.2 Validation message should remain until valid email is entered | 5.2.1 Verify validation message remains visible until a valid email is entered |
|
| Scenario 6: User Enters a Valid Email Address | 6.1 System should recognize valid email format | 6.1.1 Verify system recognizes email format <letters/numbers/./->@<letters and numbers>.<letters/numbers/.> as valid |
|  | 6.2 Validation message should be dismissed when valid email is entered | 6.2.1 Verify validation message disappears when valid email is entered |
|
| Scenario 7: User Clicks on the Next Button - Value Entered in Text Box | 7.1 System should validate if email is registered with eNOW when Next button is clicked | 7.1.1 Verify system validates whether email is registered with eNOW when Next is clicked |
|
| Scenario 8: Email is Not Registered with eNOW | 8.1 System should display appropriate message for unregistered email | 8.1.1 Verify message "Couldn't find an account for the email address provided." is displayed for unregistered email 
|
| Scenario 9: Email is Registered with eNOW | 9.1 System should present password entry mechanism for registered email | 9.1.1 Verify system presents password entry mechanism when email is confirmed to be registered |

## Detailed Test Cases

| Test Case ID | Test Scenario | Expected Result | Test Data |
|--------------|---------------|-----------------|-----------|
| 1.1.1 | Click on eNOW link | Login screen is displayed | eNOW application link |
| 1.2.1 | View Login screen | Right half of screen displays configurable image | N/A |
| 1.2.2 | View Login screen | Top left corner contains a language dropdown | N/A |
| 1.2.3 | View Login screen | Screen displays "Login" label | N/A |
| 1.2.4 | View Login screen | Text entry box is labeled "Email" | N/A |
| 1.2.5 | View Login screen | Text entry box contains default text "Enter email" | N/A |
| 1.2.6 | View Login screen | "Next" button is displayed with configurable color and enabled | N/A |
| 2.1.1 | Click on language dropdown | List of available languages is displayed | N/A |
| 2.2.1 | Open language dropdown | List includes English and Spanish options | N/A |
| 3.1.1 | Select English from language dropdown | English is set as application language | Language = "English" |
|  | Select Spanish from language dropdown | Spanish is set as application language | Language = "Spanish" |
| 3.2.1 | Select English from language dropdown | All text on Login page appears in English | Language = "English" |
|  | Select Spanish from language dropdown | All text on Login page appears in Spanish | Language = "Spanish" |
| 3.3.1 | Select any language from dropdown | Language dropdown list disappears after selection | Any available language |
| 4.1.1 | Click Next button with empty email field | Error message "Enter an email" is displayed | Email = "" (empty) |
| 5.1.1 | Begin typing in email field | Message "Please enter a valid email address" is displayed | Email = partial input (e.g., "test") |
| 5.2.1 | Type invalid email | Validation message remains visible | Email = "test" (invalid format) |
| 6.1.1 | Enter valid email format | System accepts the email as valid | Email = "user@domain.com" |
|  | Enter valid email with special characters | System accepts the email as valid | Email = "user.name-123@domain.com" |
| 6.2.1 | Enter valid email | Validation message disappears | Email = "user@domain.com" |
| 7.1.1 | Enter valid email and click Next | System checks if email is registered | Email = "user@domain.com" |
| 8.1.1 | Enter valid but unregistered email and click Next | Message "Couldn't find an account for the email address provided." is displayed | Email = "unregistered@domain.com" |
| 9.1.1 | Enter registered email and click Next | Password entry mechanism is presented | Email = "registered@domain.com" |
